clear_essay_sentences.text: Some people think that childhood is the safest period of human life.
Other believes that is not true.
They consider that children's life is a dangerous period of life.
In my opinion, childhood is the safest period.
Firstly, when you are child you don't alone.
Secondly, you don't drive a car, and it protects you because you will not be able to hurt yourself.
Thirdly, you are too young to solve your problems, so your parents can always protect you if you get into trouble.
In addition, modern life have numerous amount of child safety equipment, so if parents can buy them, they can easy protect their children.
However, a lot of people think differently.
They suppose that children are too active so parents usually can't trace them.
Furthermore, children are very sane so they are easy to deceive.
I just partially agree with them.
I think if parents really love their children they will protect and follow them.
In conclusion I can say that in the childhood child surrounded by the love of their parents and relatives.
That is why I think that childhood is the safest period.

meta.subject: eng
meta.theme: Childhood is the safest period of human life.

selections.comment: 1. Стяженные формы здесь запрещены, это нарушение стиля. 2. alone - это прилаг., поэтому are not

standard_markup.text:
Some people think that childhood is the safest period of human life. Other believes that is not true. They consider that children’s life is a dangerous period of life. So, who is right?
 In my opinion, childhood is the safest period. Firstly, when you are child you don’t alone. Adults almost always with you. Secondly, you don’t drive a car, and it protects you because you will not be able to hurt yourself. Thirdly, you are too young to solve your problems, so your parents can always protect you if you get into trouble. In addition, modern life have numerous amount of child safety equipment, so if parents can buy them, they can easy protect their children.
 However, a lot of people think differently. They suppose that children are too active so parents usually can’t trace them. Furthermore, children are very sane so they are easy to deceive.
 I just partially agree with them. I think if parents really love their children they will protect and follow them.
 In conclusion I can say that in the childhood child surrounded by the love of their parents and relatives. That is why I think that childhood is the safest period.

essay_sentences.text: Some people think that childhood is the safest period of human life.
Other believes that is not true.
They consider that children's life is a dangerous period of life.
In my opinion, childhood is the safest period.
Firstly, when you are child you do not alone.
Secondly, you do not drive a car, and it protects you because you will not be able to hurt yourself.
Thirdly, you are too young to solve your problems, so your parents can always protect you if you get into trouble.
In addition, modern life have numerous amount of child safety equipment, so if parents can buy them, they can easy protect their children.
However, a lot of people think differently.
They suppose that children are too active so parents usually cannot trace them.
Furthermore, children are very sane so they are easy to deceive.
I just partially agree with them.
I think if parents really love their children they will protect and follow them.
In conclusion I can say that in the childhood child surrounded by the love of their parents and relatives.
That is why I think that childhood is the safest period.
